mapper.sql: ORDER_HISTORY.ID ORDERHISTORY_ID, ORDER_HISTORY.ORDER_ID ORDERHISTORY_ORDERID, ORDER_HISTORY.USER_ID ORDERHISTORY_USERID, ORDER_HISTORY.OPT_NAME ORDERHISTORY_OPTNAME, ORDER_HISTORY.REMARK ORDERHISTORY_REMARK, ORDER_HISTORY.PRE_STATUS ORDERHISTORY_PRESTATUS, ORDER_HISTORY.POST_STATUS ORDERHISTORY_POSTSTATUS, ORDER_HISTORY.NORMAL ORDERHISTORY_NORMAL, ORDER_HISTORY.CREATE_TIME ORDERHISTORY_CREATETIME, ORDER_HISTORY.ENABLED ORDERHISTORY_ENABLED, ORDER_HISTORY.DELETED ORDERHISTORY_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into ORDER_HISTORY
ORDER_ID,
USER_ID,
OPT_NAME,
REMARK,
PRE_STATUS,
POST_STATUS,
NORMAL,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
DELETED,
#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update ORDER_HISTORY
ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPT_NAME = #{record.optName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_STATUS = #{record.preStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POST_STATUS = #{record.postStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NORMAL = #{record.normal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENABLED = #{record.enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from ORDER_HISTORY where DELETED = 0
